description:
This rule is used by the  Web Services connector to update parsed resource object.
    Create List of Objects  which will later converted to Resource object

input.name: application
input.description: The application whose data file is being processed.

input.name: requestEndPoint
input.description: The current request information contain header, body ,response object

input.name: processedResponseObject
input.description: Response Object processed by the Web services connector

input.name: rawResponseObject
input.description: Response Object returned from the end system

output.name: Update Account/Group List
output.description: Update information Map contains parsed list of accounts

name: After Operation Rule Template for  Web Services
